a-r-c.title: ANTI-REFLECTIVE COATING
a-r-c.description: Anti-Reflective Coating is perfect for night driving and particularly computer glasses. With an additive that nearly eliminates glare on the lens surface, this coating allows you to focus without distractions.

bf.title: BIFOCAL
bf.description: Distance & Reading - This lens has two separate and distinct fields of vision: distance & near. A visible line separates the two.

bl.title: BLUE LIGHT
bl.description: Blue Light lenses offer the best solution to deal with blue light emissions. The lenses filter the blue light emitted by digital screens, providing comfort to your eyes and protection from harmful rays.

plp-1.shipping: Progressive lens , Transitions ( Gray / Brown ) and A.R.C
plp-1.title: PREMIUM LENS PACKAGE
plp-1.description: Premium Lens Package is the ultimate optical solution with extra-thin lenses, as well as full vision and lens protection coatings.

plp-2.title: PREMIUM LENS PACKAGE
plp-2.description: Premium Lens Package is the ultimate optical solution with extra-thin lenses, as well as full vision and lens protection coatings.

pr-1.title: PROGRESSIVE
pr-1.description: Distance & Reading - This lens provides seamless progression of many lens powers for all viewing distances. It includes three fields of vision: near, intermediate and distance.

read-1.title: READERS
read-1.description: Reading - This lens is intended for seeing details at a close distance. Most commonly used for reading. It is usually indicated by a (+) next to the numbers under the “sphere” category of your prescription. You can either provide us with your exact prescription or opt by magnification strength.

slp-1.shipping: Bifocals , Transitions ( Gray / Brown ) and A.R.C
slp-1.title: STANDARD LENS PACKAGE
slp-1.description: Our Standard Lens Package includes our 2 premium coatings to give you full eye protection 365 days a year.

slp-2.title: STANDARD LENS PACKAGE
slp-2.description: Our Standard Lens Package includes our 2 premium coatings to give you full eye protection 365 days a year.

sv-1-3.shipping: Single vision plain for prescription under (+\-)3
sv-1-3.title: SINGLE VISION
sv-1-3.description: Distance - This lens helps you see details at a distance. It is usually indicated by a (-) next to the numbers under the “sphere” category of your prescription.

sv-3-25-14-00.title: SINGLE VISION ( HIGH INDEX )
sv-3-25-14-00.description: This lens helps you see details at a distance. It is usually indicated by a (-) next to the numbers under the “sphere” category of your prescription.

svt.title: SINGLE VISION / TRANSITIONS
svt.description: Distance - This lens helps you see details at a distance. It is usually indicated by a (-) next to the numbers under the “sphere” category of your prescription. Adaptive Lenses - these lenses are smartly designed to quickly adjust from clear to dark (and vice versa). This allows eyeglasses and sunglasses to be one.
